recipe.name: Omlette du fromage
recipe.instructions: Break eggs, throw them in pan. Put cheese in pan.

recipe.name: Garlic bread
recipe.instructions: Put bread in toaster. Apply garlic and salt on bread.

recipe.name: Straw potato
recipe.instructions: Cut potato like straws. Put potato in pan with hot oil. Remove when potato is literally straws.

recipe.name: Envelope soup
recipe.instructions: Put contents of envelope in hot water. Wait.
